title: Marc Lièvremont - Wikipedia
snippet: Marc Lièvremont (born 28 October 1968) is a former rugby union footballer and was the head coach of the French national rugby union team. He played as a back-row forward for France, gaining 25 caps from 1995 to 1999, and was selected in France's 1999 Rugby World Cup squad.

title: France rugby coach: Who has led the men's team over the years? ...
snippet: Marc Lievremont’s time as France’s head coach included a 2010 Six Nations Grand Slam and second-place finish at the 2011 Rugby World Cup.

title: "Des gens ont clairement décidé de me faire la peau" : Marc Lièvremont revient sur son mandat de sélectionneur et son rapport parfois chaotique aux médias - rugbyrama.fr
